title: $2795 / Stunning 2 Bedroom 2 bath with modern upgrades by The Park
map_address: 1815 N Harvard Blvd near Franklin Ave
posting_body: Stunning 2 Bedroom 2 bath with modern upgrades by The Park
Available: Now for showings and move in .

Beautiful Rent Controlled 4 story building with garden style fountain courtyard, In the middle of everything, transportation, bus lines and metro station, near LACC, minutes away from Hollywood and Highland, West Hollywood, Beverly Hills and Downtown LA.
Has: 4 levels, 47 units, elevator,  Swimming Pool,  Laundry facilities,  new HD surveillance cameras,  gated entrance, New intercom,  well maintained with low occupancy.
3 blocks from the Metro station at Western and Hollywood,  2 blocks from Griffith Park, one block to all the restaurants in Thai Town and all of Hollywood right down the boulevard.
Complete building paint just finished with purple exterior lighting and illuminated front steps.
Spacious 2nd floor 2 Bedroom 2 bath with new wood floors, new Stainless gas stove, New Stainless microwave, beautiful white granite countertops, large closets, USB outlets and many more upgrades.

Spacious living room with new paint, beautiful new real wood floors, New Air Conditioner, wall gas heater, large extra closet, Large new windows that provide lots of light and a nice cross breeze with new vertical blinds and beautiful views of the courtyard and swimming pool with the soothing sound of the decorative fountain.

Large Kitchen with lots of natural light, new stainless-steel sink and faucet, new stainless microwave and New stainless gas stove, black fridge, lots of new cabinets and marvelous new white granite countertop.
Nice large Dining area with new ceiling fan and new large windows with lots of natural light.
Hallway with real wood floors, fresh paint, and many closets for extra storage.
Large master bedroom with, ceiling fan, new a/c, very large closets and large new windows with lots of natural light and city views.
2nd Bedroom with lovely new real wood floors, ceiling fan, a 3rd new a/c, large closet and big new window with lots of natural light.
2 Large Bathrooms with new accessories, nice vanities, shower enclosure and full bathtub for relaxing.
One parking space in our underground garage optional for $50 a month.
Plenty of street parking in the neighborhood, no permits required.
Metro train station just a short walk away.
New machines in our laundry room that work with a phone Ap.
For More Information or to view the property contact the manager Tom at
•	New Air Conditioning in Living room
•	New stainless appliances and black fridge
•	1 optional parking space in our underground garage for $50 a month
•	You’re going to love this neighborhood.
For additional Ben Leeds Property listings call our Leasing Agent
Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs.
(weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.
Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.

1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application;

No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2.
*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*
Photos may vary from actual unit and are for representational purposes only and subject to variances.
Variances may include, but are not limited to, views and exposure to light, finishes for the final product, as well as layout and included features in the finished product.
